## Research Groups 

- Joint Research Unit STATSALUT: Advanced Statistical Methods  in Health Sciences UMH-FISABIO  (Principal Investigator)

- Valencia Bayesian Research Group (VABAR), based at the University of Valencia.

- Statistical Modeling Ecology Group (SMEG): An interdisciplinary research group that brings together researchers from the Schools of Mathematics and Statistics, Biology, and Ecology.

## Current Roles

- Head of the Joint Research Unit on Statistical Methods in Health Sciences (UMI MECIS UMH-FISABIO).

- Statistical Editor at Public Health Nutrition.

## Scientific Associations

- Former Treasurer of the Spanish Region of the International Biometric Society (2014-2019).

- Meber of the Executive Board of the Spanish Region of the International Biometric Society (2014-2019, 2021-)

- Member of the Representative Council of the International Biometric Society (2021-2025).

## University Management 

- Deputy Vice-Rector for Research at Universidad Miguel Hernández, Spain (2011-2015, 2015-2019, 2019-2023).

- Deputy Director of the Institute of Mathematics, Data Science, and Artificial Intelligence at Universidad Miguel Hernández, Spain (2023-).
